name: Passive Mode
body:
### Passive Mode Passive Mode is a plugin for the Just Cause 2 Multiplayer modification. It allows players to type in a chat command and become passive - they wont receive damage from other players, and the other players wont receive their damage. ### How it works When you first type ```/passive``` or ```/afk```, you will become a passive player. Typing those commands again will disable the passive mode for you. ### Installation To install Passive Mode on your server, download the ZIP file provided above, and extract the folder **PassiveMode** to ```Just Cause 2 Multiplayer server location\scripts```. ### Support If you have any issues during the installation or usage of the Passive Mode plugin, contact us at rockytvbr@gmail.com or anzuswargames@gmail.com. Please provide ingame screenshots with the console window open so we can address the issue. ### Credits Techjar
FabioGNR
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
